'''''J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings Color & Activity Book''''' is a [[1979]] book intended for children, based on [[Ralph Bakshi]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|The Lord of the Rings]]''.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.amazon.com/J-R-R-Tolkiens-Rings-Color-Activity/dp/B000R1C05K|articlename=J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings Color and Activity Book|dated=|website=AM|accessed=26 August 2013}}</ref>
==See also==
*''[[J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings Coloring Book]]''
